basic_info.description: Hi, my name is Miranda, I am a software developer proficient at JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. I have a background in finance and scientific research. During my professional career I discovered my interest in programming, and that was when I pivoted to a career in tech. I look forward to starting a career that allows me to use both of my quantitative reasoning and coding skills. I am also an army vetaran, and I am fluent in English and Mandarin Chinese.

projects.title: Ruthles Photography
projects.description: The first website I built from scratch with a team named Apathetic Mosquitoes. It was a website built for Ruth, a photographer who serves the greater Seattle area. The lay out, design, and logo were all designed from ground up.

projects.title: Horned Beast
projects.description: A project that allows the user to vote for the image displayed. Users can also filter the images based on number of horns.

projects.title: Project 3 placehorlder
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
